Class Scrape

extends java.lang.Object
    Scrapes Flightaware for a list of air flights

    • Method Detail

      • urlGen

        public java.lang.String urlGen(int offset)
        Creates the URL we will attempt to grab. We need to be able to change the airport and iterate through pages.
        Parameters:
        offset - Multiple of 20. The site returns tables of 20 rows so we need several page grabs to get all flights for an airport.
        Returns:
        The URL we have generated

      • genMap

        public java.util.Map genMap()
        Creates a map of time zones to their UTC offset. The airport reports times by timezone. We need to correct the time or our connection data and flight times will be bad.
        Returns:
        The map of time zones to UTC.

      • timeToDouble

        public double timeToDouble(java.lang.String time)
        Formats the time we grab from a website into a usable double.
        Parameters:
        time - The string we get from the website.
        Returns:
        The double-converted form of that time.

      • getCal

        public Calendar getCal()
        Scrapes the website for a set of flights and inserts them into a Calendar. Does not currently work.
        Returns:
        The Calendar we generate.

      • fakeGetCal

        public Calendar fakeGetCal()
        Placeholder which creates a Calendar based on artificial data
        Returns:
        The calendar of fake data

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Test program in main
        Parameters:
        args -
